nodes.text: Star Wars Rebels: Darth Vader, Rebel Hunter!

Star Wars Rebels: Darth Vader, Rebel Hunter! is a young readers reference book in the Star Wars Rebels line with a focus on Darth Vader and his actions against the Spectres. Authored by Lauren Nesworthy and 48 pages long, it was published on July 5, 2016.
Prepare to meet the rebels' greatest enemy yet!

Learn all about one of the most terrifying figures in the Empire, Darth Vader, in DK Reader Level 2: Star Wars Rebels™: Darth Vader, Rebel Hunter! Discover how the evil Sith Lord plans to defeat the rebels once and for all.

Level 2 titles contain carefully selected photographic images to complement the text, providing strong visual clues to build vocabulary and confidence for kids who are beginning to read fluently with support. Additional information spreads provide fun facts that help develop the topics through a range of nonfiction presentation styles, such as diagrams and activities.
